title: PSDocs options
description: A schema for PSDocs YAML options files.

configuration.title: Configuration values
configuration.description: A set of key/ value configuration options for document definitions.
configuration.markdownDescription: A set of key/ value configuration options for document definitions. [See help](https://github.com/microsoft/PSDocs/blob/main/docs/concepts/PSDocs/en-US/about_PSDocs_Options.md#configuration)

languageMode.title: Language mode
languageMode.description: The PowerShell language mode to use for document execution. The default is FullLanguage.
languageMode.markdownDescription: The PowerShell language mode to use for document execution. The default is `FullLanguage`. [See help](https://github.com/microsoft/PSDocs/blob/main/docs/concepts/PSDocs/en-US/about_PSDocs_Options.md#executionlanguagemode)

input-option.title: Input options
input-option.description: Options that affect how input types are processed.

format.title: Input format
format.description: The input string format. The default is Detect, which will try to detect the format when the -InputPath parameter is used.
format.markdownDescription: The input string format. The default is `Detect`, which will try to detect the format when the `-InputPath` parameter is used. [See help](https://github.com/microsoft/PSDocs/blob/main/docs/concepts/PSDocs/en-US/about_PSDocs_Options.md#inputformat)

objectPath.title: Object path
objectPath.description: The object path to a property to use instead of the pipeline object.
objectPath.markdownDescription: The object path to a property to use instead of the pipeline object. [See help](https://github.com/microsoft/PSDocs/blob/main/docs/concepts/PSDocs/en-US/about_PSDocs_Options.md#inputobjectpath)

pathIgnore.title: Path ignore
pathIgnore.description: Ignores input files that match the path spec.
pathIgnore.markdownDescription: Ignores input files that match the path spec. [See help](https://github.com/microsoft/PSDocs/blob/main/docs/concepts/PSDocs/en-US/about_PSDocs_Options.md#inputpathignore)

columnPadding.title: Column padding
columnPadding.description: Determines how table columns are padded. By default (MatchHeader), pads the header with a single space, then pads the column value, to the same width as the header.
columnPadding.markdownDescription: Determines how table columns are padded. By default (`MatchHeader`), pads the header with a single space, then pads the column value, to the same width as the header. [See help](https://github.com/microsoft/PSDocs/blob/main/docs/concepts/PSDocs/en-US/about_PSDocs_Options.md#markdowncolumnpadding)

encoding.title: Encoding
encoding.description: Sets the text encoding used for markdown output files. By default (Default), UTF-8 without byte order mark (BOM) is used.
encoding.markdownDescription: Sets the text encoding used for markdown output files. By default (`Default`), UTF-8 without byte order mark (BOM) is used. [See help](https://github.com/microsoft/PSDocs/blob/main/docs/concepts/PSDocs/en-US/about_PSDocs_Options.md#markdownencoding)

skipEmptySections.title: Skip empty sections
skipEmptySections.description: Determines if empty sections are included in output. By default, sections without content are not included in output.
skipEmptySections.markdownDescription: Determines if empty sections are included in output. By default, sections without content are not included in output. [See help](https://github.com/microsoft/PSDocs/blob/main/docs/concepts/PSDocs/en-US/about_PSDocs_Options.md#markdownskipemptysections)

useEdgePipes.title: Use edge pipes
useEdgePipes.description: Determines when pipes on the edge of a table should be used. By default (WhenRequired), edge pipes are only used when required.
useEdgePipes.markdownDescription: Determines when pipes on the edge of a table should be used. By default (`WhenRequired`), edge pipes are only used when required. [See help](https://github.com/microsoft/PSDocs/blob/main/docs/concepts/PSDocs/en-US/about_PSDocs_Options.md#markdownuseedgepipes)

wrapSeparator.title: Wrap separator
wrapSeparator.description: Specifies the character/ string to use when wrapping lines in a table cell. By default a space is used.
wrapSeparator.markdownDescription: Specifies the character/ string to use when wrapping lines in a table cell. By default a space (` `) is used. [See help](https://github.com/microsoft/PSDocs/blob/main/docs/concepts/PSDocs/en-US/about_PSDocs_Options.md#markdownwrapseparator)

output-option.title: Output options
output-option.description: Options that affect how output is generated.

culture.title: Culture
culture.description: One or more cultures to use for generating output. When multiple cultures are specified, the first matching culture will be used. By default, the current PowerShell culture is used.
culture.markdownDescription: One or more cultures to use for generating output. When multiple cultures are specified, the first matching culture will be used. By default, the current PowerShell culture is used. [See help](https://github.com/microsoft/PSDocs/blob/main/docs/concepts/PSDocs/en-US/about_PSDocs_Options.md#outputculture)

path.title: Output path
path.description: The file path location to save results.
path.markdownDescription: The file path location to save results. [See help](https://github.com/microsoft/PSDocs/blob/main/docs/concepts/PSDocs/en-US/about_PSDocs_Options.md#outputpath)
